name: B&B Alberti

reviews.text: B&B Alberti is a hidden gem in one of the most beautiful cities in The Netherlands. The rooms are clean, the beds are very comfortable, the location is absolutely fantastic and Ingrid Alberti is the host every traveller is looking for. She has a very deep knowledge of all that Maastricht has to offer. Furthermore, she is very well connected to people in the university, art, hospitality and investment community which was very helpful in the context of a project I am working on.
reviews.title: B&B Alberti - a hidden gem in Maastricht
Bed & Bike Alberti: an excelent choice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I loved to stay at Bed & Bike Alberti. I had a spacy room with very good beds, a huge bathroom with tub, free coffee / tea / soup / cocoa, and a number of bicycles for free to cycle into and around Maastricht.
reviews.title: A real dutch experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Indeed, Ingrid is a lovely and discreet host: she gives plenty of tips about the things to see and do, and knows the best suiting hotspots for wine-and-dine.
reviews.title: Good place to stay in Maastricht
Clean, comfortable, convenient to town, and a lovely host who as a bonus speaks english!
reviews.text: All type of facilities are in the near area (5 minute biking / 10 minutes walk to the Vrijthof and Onze Lieve Vrouwe square), whilst the B&B is situated in a very nice and quiet part of Maasticht. I'll be back soon!!

description: Bed&Bike Alberti is located in a beautiful art deco house just outside the city center (a ten minute walk or five minutes by bike). Stylish, quiet, clean, comfortable. Spacious rooms, wonderful beds, private bathroom, TV, kitchenette, free WIFI, free coffee and tea. We do not serve breakfast, but there is a supermarket and bakery just around the corner. You'll also find there two lovely breakfast cafés. And each guest gets a bike to explore the city and the countryside. It is the best of two worlds: a quiet room with city life just around the corner.
